import React from "react"; function orderDetails(props){ return( <>
Order Details
{orders[0].items.map(item => { {console.log('item=',item)} return ( ) })}
Item Price Quantity Total
{item.name}
Size {item.size}
 ${item.price} {item.quantity} ${Total(item.price,item.quantity)}
) } export default orderDetails
